ISSUE.TITLE: Number of return requests on dashboards could be greater than real number return requests (not visible on "return requests" list)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Or at least we should not load such return requests in "SearchReturnRequests" method of \Nop.Web\Administration\Controllers\ReturnRequestController.cs Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/44334/new-dashboard-pending-return-requests.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Cache static content by default for 24 hours (cacheControlMaxAge)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1766 We should display return requests with delete order items
